text: hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoeeojyeoss-eul ttae geudaeneun bulsinja deul-ui eolgul-eseo silh-eoham-eul alge doe eossdoda geudeul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-i nangsongdoen geudeul-eul gong-gyeoghalyeo hadoda illeogalodoe naega igeosboda deo na ppeun geos-eul neohuiege gyeong-gohanani bul sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihae hananimkkeseo malyeonhan geos-eun jiogppun-ini jeojuseuleoun unmyeong-i doelila
